trans-unit.source: This enumeration provides additional information about the different notifications that can be received by the dependency event handler.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举提供有关不同通知的其他信息，这些信息可由依赖项事件处理程序接收。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo> enumeration is referenced by an instance of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo>枚举引用的实例<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationEventArgs>类。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="SqlDependency" /> object already fired, and new commands cannot be added to it.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="SqlDependency" /> 对象已激发，无法向该对象添加新命令。

trans-unit.source: An underlying server object related to the query was modified.
trans-unit.target: 与已修改的查询相关的基础服务器对象。

trans-unit.source: Data was changed by a DELETE statement.
trans-unit.target: 数据已由 DELETE 语句更改。

trans-unit.source: An underlying object related to the query was dropped.
trans-unit.target: 与已丢弃的查询相关的基础对象。

trans-unit.source: An internal server error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 发生内部服务器错误。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="SqlDependency" /> object has expired.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="SqlDependency" /> 对象已过期。

trans-unit.source: Data was changed by an INSERT statement.
trans-unit.target: 数据已由 INSERT 语句更改。

trans-unit.source: A statement was provided that cannot be notified (for example, an UPDATE statement).
trans-unit.target: 提供了无法通知的语句（例如，UPDATE 语句）。

trans-unit.source: The statement was executed under an isolation mode that was not valid (for example, Snapshot).
trans-unit.target: 在无效的隔离模式下执行该语句（例如，快照）。

trans-unit.source: Used to distinguish the server-side cause for a query notification firing.
trans-unit.target: 用于查明触发查询通知的服务器端原因。

trans-unit.source: The SET options were not set appropriately at subscription time.
trans-unit.target: 订阅时没有正确设置 SET 选项。

trans-unit.source: A previous statement has caused query notifications to fire under the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: 上一语句导致在当前事务下激发了查询通知。

trans-unit.source: A SELECT statement that cannot be notified or was provided.
trans-unit.target: 不能通知或已提供的 SELECT 语句。

trans-unit.source: Fires as a result of server resource pressure.
trans-unit.target: 因服务器资源压力而激发。

trans-unit.source: The server was restarted (notifications are sent during restart.).
trans-unit.target: 服务器已重新启动（重新启动期间发送通知）。

trans-unit.source: The subscribing query causes the number of templates on one of the target tables to exceed the maximum allowable limit.
trans-unit.target: 订阅查询导致某一目标表上的模板数量超过允许的最大限制。

trans-unit.source: One or more tables were truncated.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个表已截断。

trans-unit.source: Used when the info option sent by the server was not recognized by the client.
trans-unit.target: 在客户端无法识别出服务器所发送的信息选项时使用。

trans-unit.source: Data was changed by an UPDATE statement.
trans-unit.target: 数据已由 UPDATE 语句更改。
